summary: First-time upload of my female PC, Anka, for your next Skyrim adventure.
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=3][/size] Hello! This is the "Anka" preset I created from scratch to be used in Skyrim. It's a preset (.jslot) file that you'll need to place into Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/Chargen/Presets folder. She's a Wood Elf (I'm not exactly sure how she'll look on other races but heck, give it a try!) The requirements are listed below and I can guarantee if you don't have some of these, she probably wont look right. Please let me know if I missed anything![/center]

[center]Credits:[/center]


*[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu[/url]*
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]*Bodyslide and Outfit Studio*[/url]
Hair: KS [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]Hairdos[/url] - Renewal
Body: Dimonized [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]UNP[/url] Female Body
Body Preset (Optional): [url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3424-slick-silk-body-preset/]Slick[/url] Silk Body (Potentially NSFW-site)
Skin: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36425]Real Girls[/url] Realistic Body Texture for UNP UNPB and SeveNbase - WIP & [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24273]Ethereal Elven Overhaul[/url]
Eyes: The Eyes of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]Beauty[/url]
Head Shape: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58989/?]CITRUS[/url] Heads (HD Meshes) (This is a [b]MUST[/b] need! Choose the standalone version if you only want your PC to have this head)
Beauty: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31665]Better Makeup[/url] for SKSE / [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701]Seductive Lips[/url] - HD / [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52841]Freckle Mania[/url] / [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url] / [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34346]Smile[/url] in HD
Armor: The Amazing World of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/83383]Bikini[/url] Armor

[center]Note:[/center]
[size=4]You can use my preset in your Skyrim game but please, do not reupload to Steam Workshop or sites like Loverslab[/size][size=5]![/size][size=6] [b]You may [u]NOT[/u] use this to create [u]ANY[/u] kind of follower mods [u]AT ALL[/u].[/b][/size]
author: ketkoi
